#!/usr/bin/env python3

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x.sort()
    if n % 2 == 0:
        print(x[n // 2] - x[n // 2 - 1])
    else:
        print(0)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

min_cost = float('inf') # 最小コスト
for i in range(n):
    cost = 0
    for j in range(n):
        cost += abs(x[j] - x[i])
    min_cost = min(min_cost, cost)

print(min_cost)
